Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Class ModelBakeEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ModelBakeEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModBusEvent
public class ModelBakeEvent extends net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event implements IModBusEvent
Fired when the ModelManager is notified of the resource manager reloading. Called after model registry is setup, but before it's passed to BlockModelShapes.

This event is not cancellable, and does not have a result.

These events are fired on the mod-specific event bus, only on the logical client.
